name: Zombie Break With Skins For Minecraft
name_original: Zombie Break With Skins For Minecraft
description:
Sometimes our life seems to be boring and monotonous. You can entertain yourself in your own way! Make a break to shoot some undead enemies in our dynamic eventful shooting game with gun multiplayer!
Zombie Break is a first person shooting game which lets you to stay and survive in the battle against hordes of aggressive dead ones, annoying bats and other dangerous creatures. This zombie survival game isn’t simple - you will have to prove your skill in shooting. Can you become the one of the deadliest zombie catchers in shooting game with gun multiplayer or simply die again and again? This zombie shooting game will determine can you stay after living dead and shoot them to their heads!
We know you’ve already seen many zombie survival games online. Just scroll down if you can simply pass by a real challenge to your skills in shooting online. But if you are ready to fight and survive in the crazy rhythm of the battle you can stay and shoot them to their heads.
You can test the power of deadly arsenal in this shooting game with gun multiplayer!
Choose guns wisely! Uzi is good for start - cheap and fast but low damage and accuracy. Rifle has better damage and accuracy but not as fast as Uzi. Shotgun is slow but deadly. With shotgun you can kill several foes with one shot! You can also try such marvellous guns as tommy gun, grenade launcher and minigun which are very good with large hordes of enemies because of high fire speed and damage. There are many ways of shooting online to fight with the living dead. Choose your own!
Game difficulty will grow up with your experience. Each wave is harder than previous one. How many ways of monsters can you withstand? Let’s check it out while shooting online!
Be careful! Living corpses wouldn’t leave you alone without some deadly “hugs”. Do not let them to reach you! Shoot fast and accurate! Make zombies cry or they will eat your brains without any sauce!
Enjoy the game! We hope you will survive all the hordes of living dead and have fun! Show no fear and no mercy to living corpses! Break as many enemies as you can on your zombie break. Deal headshots and let the bullets fly!

————————————————————————————------------------------------------
This is not an official Mojang app. We are not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft game
